name: Short Fuse - GMTKJam
description:
Short Fuse was created in 48 hours for the Game Maker’s Toolkit’s Game Jam 2019. The theme for the jam was "Only 1".

With that I chose to do "Only 1" second.  In this endless runner, players in Short Fuse are given only one second in between rocket boosts and deciding where to jet off next.

Controls
Using the mouse you will be able to steer the rocket and navigate UI when necessary.

If you have problems with the Web-Build, I would recommend playing the downloadable version.
